review_blob:
This is one nasty light lager, it lacks color & flavor.  There is no way this ever won a blue ribbon.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This is by far my favorite ale in the Sierra Nevada line up. I would rather be drinking GLBC Christmas ale but if it's all sold out this is a close second. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This is a overpowering beast of a beer, or barley wine.  I can drink one of these, but honestly there are other things I would rather be drinking.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This is a delicious true pumpkin ale with a great taste.  I look forward to its release every year.  Better be quick, it's sells out fast.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This is a good IPA with a lot of hop flavor without being over powering.  It's crisp with a smooth finish.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Harpoons summer beer is a great hot weather beer, very refreshing.  Good wheat beer with a citrus vibe.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

I love Intercorse!  good dark porter with a roasty kind of vibe. Mixes well with ales to make black and tans.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Chocolate coffee deliciousness.  This is a heavy flavorful porter that goes down smooth. One of my favorites.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Good beer,  if your in the mood for something hoppy but not over powering, this will do.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

As far as lagers go, it's not bad.  A giant leap up from normal American light lagers.  Much better on tap than on a bottle.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Great summertime ale.  It really hits the spot on a hot day, and after a few of these your ready for a late afternoon nap.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Great Lakes Holy Moses White Ale

review_blob:
This is in my opinion the very best Christmas ale out there.  It has a great ale taste with a hint of cinnamon. Sells out fast, so you got to be on the ball! 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This beer didn't stand out at all, your run of the mill Irish ale.  It doesn't taste bad, but it doesn't satisfy you either.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Not bad,  but there is defiantly better out there.  Overpowering aftertaste makes it almost impossible to drink more than one of these.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Good Good Good!!!  This is by far one of my favorite IIPA's,  hoppy as hell without being overpowering.  One of the best in the GLBC line-up!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

This is as good as it gets as far as Octoberfest goes,what it is lacking in hops it makes up in tradition,  this one goes well with a football game on a cool fall day.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Damn!!!  You may have already had this one and blacked out.  It is very hoppy and very very VERY high in alcohol just have one of these with some food.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Great Lakes Lake Erie Monster Imperial IPA

review_blob:
This is a good one, unfortunately it isn't bottled and is hard to find on tap.  So if you see it give it a try, you may not get another chance!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

It hits the spot on the hottest of days, but overall could be more flavorful!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
